tool_description: This API will convert group of images into an animated GIF image. You need to provide comma separated URLs of images and API will return the URL of result GIF image
name: Images to GIF converter
title: Images to GIF converter

api_list.name: converttogif
api_list.description: Convert list of images to a GIF image

required_parameters.name: imageurls
required_parameters.description: Comma separated URLs of images which needs to be converted into a GIF

required_parameters.name: delay
required_parameters.description: How much should be delay between the animation of 2 images. It will be in milliseconds. Default is 1000 (i.e 1 second)
